id.kaytrust.core.identity.ethereum.client

Interface EthereumIdentityConsumer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IdentityConsumer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EthereumIdentityConsumerImpl

    public interface EthereumIdentityConsumer
extends IdentityConsumer
    The generalized interface compliant with any ethereum network that should be used by end users in order to query about capabilities granted to their devices to access their registered identities in the Ethereum Network.
    See Also:
    IdentityConsumer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean hasCap(String proxyAddress, String addressDevice, String capability) 
      static EthereumIdentityConsumer instance(String hostRpc, String token, String... contractAddresses)
      Sets the identity Manager wrapper instances to interact with the Identity Manager smart contracts deployed in the ethereum network.

      • Methods inherited from interface id.kaytrust.core.identity.base.IdentityConsumer

        checkIdentityToken, isDeviceAuthorized

    • Method Detail

      • instance

        static EthereumIdentityConsumer instance(String hostRpc,
                                         String token,
                                         String... contractAddresses)
        Sets the identity Manager wrapper instances to interact with the Identity Manager smart contracts deployed in the ethereum network.
        Parameters:
        hostRpc - host and port where ethereum node serves RPC requests
        token - can be blank, is token field Authorization
        contractAddresses - List of contract addresses where the Identity Manager smart contracts live.
        Returns:
        instance of EthereumIdentityConsumer

      • hasCap

        boolean hasCap(String proxyAddress,
               String addressDevice,
               String capability)
        throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException
